info.title: Eliza Cloud API
info.description: AI agent infrastructure API. Supports REST, MCP, and A2A protocols with API key authentication.

get.description: List all API keys for your organization (session auth only - won't work with API key)

post.description: List all API keys for your organization (session auth only - won't work with API key)

delete.description: Delete an API key (session auth only - won't work with API key)

patch.description: Delete an API key (session auth only - won't work with API key)

post.description: Regenerate API key secret (old key becomes invalid) (session auth only - won't work with API key)
AI assistant for creating character definitions (session auth only)

get.description: List all media generations (images and videos) (supports API key auth)

post.description: Generate creative prompts for image/video generation (session auth only)

get.description: List all available AI models (supports API key auth)
